Password is limited to 5-16 bytes.\nSame as account is not allowed

Downloading new firmware,do not pull out the power
Upgrading new firmware,it takes about 2–3 minutes\n do not pull out the power
Please make sure that the network smooth and try again
The host may was turned off
KK connect network failed,please reset the network.
KK is offline, please check the device network.
No channel is available.Please retry later after channels are released
New version detected%s\n An upgrade is needed to proceed
Too frequent to click on the ads,please try again after accessing remote control.
WiFi setting can only be changed with-in same LAN, and KK is connected by cable.
A reset of KK hardware is needed after removal\n before bind to another account.
A WiFi adapter is detected on your KK device\n Setup it now？
IP setting can only be accessed with-in same LAN, and KK is connected by cable.
To avoid potential safety regards, password can only be modified with-in same LAN, and KK is connected by cable.
Connect failed, maybe an incorrect IP setting?
USB device connection exception causes the KK keyboard and mouse signal unable to output.
You can not update current KK until the updating of another KK is done.
If you need to remote the host after restarting,please set self-starting for Sunlogin in the remote host os.
Not permitted, the remote computer has remote assitance disabled
This host does not support remote wakeup
Every step we made is based on your suggestions and comments

The contents are too large to cause replication failure.

or scan QR code to download it.

1. Connection is unstable, check your power and network cable. \n2. Your phone is not connected to WiFi or not under same LAN of KK. \n3. Weak signals will also affect the scanning result.
KK can only be controlled through the access password.\nAfter password is set, KK will be automatically listed under your account

No internet connect of current network\nCheck to fix it.

\u3000\u3000Dear users, Oray attaches importance to the privacy and personal information protection of users.When you normally use Oray products and services, your identity information, contact information and other information should be collected, used and stored according to law.
\u3000\u3000Oray has been taking industry-leading security measures to strictly protect your information security.For details, please refer to the Oray privacy policy.
\u3000\u3000Please read carefully and fully understand the terms of the agreement before you click to agree to the following agreement.

Please ensure the smart plug is powered
Plug the device into power \n Ensure the smart plug is waiting for binding
The indicator is blinking in blue
no smart plug found, ensure the device is standby
failed to bind a smart plug
Bind a host to the smart plug, remote start/stop it everywhere
Are you sure to bind host %s?
Success!\n 2 more steps, remote start/stop it everywhere
Step1. connect host\'s power into the smart plug
Step2. turn on AC recovery in pc BIOS
how to turn on ac recovery?
switch off the smart plug after shut down host
Host will not start unless you switch off the smart plug
failed to get more info of the smart plug
other problems \nplease long press for 5 seconds smart plug button to reset
retry after reset or get more information
the smart plug is bound to other account, retry add after unbind
smart plug is switched on, click on button will cause it switch off first
Bind a host to the smart plug,\n remote start/stop it everywhere
no host found, please add a host first
timer exists, please try another one
current version does not support the function, please upgrade
new version detected,\n please upgrade before use
attention: smart plug will reboot after upgrade
1. Plug the device into power \n 2.Ensure the smart plug is waiting for binding
check whether smart plug connected to power \n and network changed or error
The smart plug failed in network login, please check the network
Confirm your WiFi name and password\nWIFI:%s password:%b
bind complete\n ,click device-host to start it
click shutdown button when remote to turn off switch off the smart plug
It is detected that the current host is bound to the WakeUp Devices and the Smart Plug,please select the boot mode.
Some motherboards need to be powered off 2-5 minutes before the power is completely turned off. It is recommended to turn on the power after 5 minutes after the power is turned off.
No permission of reading WiFi information
Control your PC power after switching to [device] view
Timed switch off only\n timed switch on feature needs wake up devices\n like wake up stick, wake up plugs
All hosts within LAN can be wake up
wake up a host via WiFi
(Timed power control feature is in host power setting page)
associated with %s \nhost will wake up after power on
associated with %s\n shutdown function is in host feature page\n host will lost power after the plug switched off
shutdown function is in host feature page
associated with %s, Timed power control feature is in host timed control page
